snippet: A sprawling new park brings a bit of wonder — and unparalleled views of Manhattan and Brooklyn — to Governors Island....
abstract: Leslie Koch, former president and chief executive of Trust for Governors Island, collaborates with landscape architect Adriaan Geuze of Netherlands firm West 8 on design of 30-acre park on Governors Island.
lead_paragraph: A sprawling new park brings a bit of wonder — and unparalleled views of Manhattan and Brooklyn — to Governors Island.

headline.main: The Stunning (and Fun) Transformation of a Forgotten New York Landmark
